kind.desc: The API credential kind, can be one of: `webapp`, `sales_channel`, `integration` or the kind of app you want to fork (e.g. `orders`, `imports`, etc.).

confidential.desc: Indicates if the API credential it's confidential.

scopes.example: market:all market:9 market:122 market:6 stock_location:6 stock_location:33

expires_in.desc: The lifetime of the access token in seconds (min. `7200`, max. `31536000`. Default is `14400` for Sales channels and `7200` for other client types).

mode.desc: Indicates the environment the resource belongs to (one of `test` or `live`).

custom.desc: Indicates if the API credential is used to create a custom app (e.g. fork a hosted app).

created_at.desc: Time at which the resource was created.

updated_at.desc: Time at which the resource was last updated.

reference.desc: A string that you can use to add any external identifier to the resource. This can be useful for integrating the resource to an external system, like an ERP, a marketing tool, a CRM, or whatever.

reference_origin.desc: Any identifier of the third party system that defines the reference code.

metadata.desc: Set of key-value pairs that you can attach to the resource. This can be useful for storing additional information about the resource in a structured format.

organization.desc: The organization associated to the API credential.

role.desc: The role associated to the API credential.

filters.desc: Set of key-value pairs that contains restrictions and scopes of the application membership.

application_memberships.desc: The application memberships associated to the membership.

logo_url.desc: The URL to the organization's logo.

favicon_url.desc: The URL to the organization's favicon.

primary_color.desc: The organization's primary color. Format is HEX (starts with `#` and it's followed by six letters and/or numbers).

contrast_color.desc: The organization's contrast color. Format is HEX (starts with `#` and it's followed by six letters and/or numbers).

gtm_id.desc: The organization's Google Tag Manager ID.

gtm_id_test.desc: The organization's Google Tag Manager ID for test.

discount_disabled.desc: Indicates if organization has discount disabled.

account_disabled.desc: Indicates if organization has account disabled.

acceptance_disabled.desc: Indicates if organization has acceptance disabled.

max_concurrent_promotions.desc: The maximum number of active concurrent promotions allowed for your organization.

max_concurrent_imports.desc: The maximum number of concurrent imports allowed for your organization.

region.desc: The region where the organization it's located, default value it's `eu-west-1`.

can_switch_live.desc: Indicates if the organization can switch to live mode.

subscription_info.desc: Information about the current subscription such as the plan type, limits and subscription totals counter.

can_read.desc: Determines if the permission have access to read rights.

can_update.desc: Determines if the permission have access to update rights.

can_destroy.desc: Determines if the permission have access to destroy rights.

subject.desc: The resource where this permission is applied.

restrictions.desc: An object that contains additional restrictions.
